title: [Self-directed] Critical Thinking Enhancement Program Using Chemistry Board Games

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental chemical concepts (atoms, molecules, compounds, etc.)
context.additional_context: Game-Based Learning Environment Using Digital Devices. Students Learn Aliphatic Derivatives via "Al Chemist Knight" Board Game on LMS

learning_goals: Students can explain the structure and properties of alkane derivative compounds with over 80% accuracy through a chemistry board game.
Learners can apply at least three critical thinking indicators (question focus, argument construction, alternative evaluation) during in-game problem-solving processes.
Learner engagement and satisfaction in digital game-based learning environments achieve a score of 3.0 or higher on a 4-point scale.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
